channel.title: One small picture problem
channel.description: I know this is probably the wrong server, but... Do you know when your reading a download thread, and the pictures are up on screen, in with the writing not as an attachment, how do i do this? Like the picture is full size, not an attachment ?? please tell me how!

item.title: One small picture problem
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Copy and paste the url from the website in between the tags.

Read full topic

item.title: One small picture problem
item.dc:creator: @josh_eya_2oo8 josh_eya_2oo8
item.description:
@josh_eya_2oo8 wrote:

So should i just upload the pictures to Imageshack then do that, type in:

[img]http://www.imageshack.com/picture.jpg[/img]

Like that ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 08 April 2008, 13:47:16[/size][hr]I mean like this:

[img]www.imageshack.com/picturenamehere.jpg[img]

Like that?

Read full topic

item.title: One small picture problem
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

instead of pressing “attach”,

in the message body add pictures like this:

[img]websitename.com/picture.jpg[/img]

Read full topic
